assessments.status_rationale: The prediction references an "announced merger" between Coursera and Udemy, but no such announcement is evidenced in today’s bullets; the claim is hard to evaluate without specifying the announcement date/source and transaction structure.
Today’s news bullets contain no mention of the FTC filing a complaint or announcing a settlement/order involving Instacart and algorithmic/AI pricing practices.
No item in today’s bullets indicates Coinbase has launched U.S. retail-accessible U.S.-listed equity trading.
There is a MarketWatch headline about Micron, but the provided bullets do not include a Micron earnings release or a revenue figure confirming quarterly revenue ≥ $9.0B.

While Oracle is mentioned in relation to TikTok’s U.S. deal, there is no clear evidence in the bullets of Oracle announcing an external financing partner/co-investor for the Michigan data center project.
No bullet references Freddie Mac’s PMMS weekly 30-year fixed rate printing at or above 7.00%.
Today’s bullets do not mention Brent front-month settlements or any ≥ $85/bbl settlement event.
There is no Statistics Canada release referenced in today’s bullets indicating quarter-over-quarter negative population growth.
No bullet reports a DOE Loan Programs Office (or other DOE vehicle) conditional commitment or finalized loan guarantee totaling at least $2.0B for a U.S. nuclear project.
